title: Ozone formation potential related to the release of volatile organic compounds (VOCs) and nitrogen oxide (NOX) from a typical industrial park in the Pearl River Delta

Ozone (O3) pollution has been recognized as the major air pollution in the Pearl River Delta (PRD) region, South China.
